channel.title: Awesomes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Awesomes on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Programming
item.description: Garbage Code Cognitive Load Reduce complex conditionals Remove nested ifs with early returns Don’t abuse DRY Don’t tightly couple Why I Hate Frameworks How to Not Write Garbage Code by Linus Torvalds 5 Software Engineering Foot-guns Writing clever code instead of clear code Not being willing to “throw it all away” Creating abstractions prematurely Not properly respecting the complexity of distributed systems Waiting too long to ask for help Simplicity Visual Readability Patterns Keep conditional tests as short as possible Minimize nested logic Short lived variables 8 Lines of Code “If you find you need an extension to your IDE to understand what’s going on, it’s probably not simple.

item.title: GrapheneOS
item.description: Setup GrapheneOS Web Installer Contacts Export Google contacts App compatibility Main Apps NordVPN APK or use NordPVN with OpenVPN for Android using OpenVPN config files Mullvad VPN. Download from F-Droid DeGoogle Apps Google Play Store Droid-ify: F-Droic client. Download from F-Droid or GitHub Auorora Store: Download from F-Droid. GitHub Repo An unofficial, FOSS client to Google Play Works with or without Google Play Services Maps Still trying to figure out the best alternative.

item.title: Cool
item.description: Fun Let’s Get Creative: A collection of high-quality, free, online creativity tools. Music Box Fun: 15-note “music box” After Dark CSS

item.title: League of Legends
item.description: Settings Borderless window 25 Settings for Season 14 Game Enable “Clamp cast target location within max range” Disable “Move camera on revive” Quick cast “Quick Cast All” (Hotkeys) Rebind normal cast to Shift+<ability> so you can still see the range indicator (Hotkeys) Attack move Enable “Attack move on cursor” (Game) Enable “Show Attack Range” (Interface) Target Champions Only (Hotkeys) Treat “Target Champions Only” as a toggle (Game) F key cycling Rebind “Select Ally 1-4” to Z, X, C, V (Hotkeys) Chat Enable “Show timestamps” Set “Change Chat Visibility” to “Same Team” In every game type /mute all and /mutepings all Interface Set “HUD Scale” to 0 Set “Map Scale” to 50-65 Enable “Show Loss of Control UI” Set “Show Names Above Healthbar” to “Champion Name” Enable “Champion highlight on camera center” Enable “Enable Line Missile display” Enable “Show Spell costs” Disable “Show Off-Screen Pings” Set “Emote Buuble Display” to Off Set “Emote Size” to Small Enable “Mute enemy Emotes” Set “Eternals Milestone Display” to “None” Video Disable “Wait for Vertical Sync” (Video) “Effects Quality” should be at least Medium “Character Quality” should be at least Medium “Environment Quality” should be Low or High because there is no difference between Low vs Medium or High vs Very High “Shadow Quality” can be turned Off Enable “Hide eye candy” Enable “Color blind mode” Sound Disable “Music Volume” Disable “Voice Volume” Disable “Ambience Volume” Lower “Ping Volume” and “Announcer Volume” lower than your “Sound FX Volume”

item.title: Web Games
item.description: Web Games Free HTML5 Games Swordbattle.io Pacman from Google 2010 micropolisJS: Open source micropolis (SimCity) simulator Puzzles 2048 Regex Crossword Gandalf AI Game by Lakera.: Trick the AI (Gandalf) into revealing the secret password. Wordle Family Wordle (original) Absurdle Semantle Sudoku Family Basic Techniques Sumarai Sudoku Misc Tetris in a PDF
